body.name: Aureday 88’’ Flexible Phone Tripod with 14.95’’ Gooseneck, Bluetooth Remote and Phone Holder, Overhead Cell Phone Stand＆Selfie Stick for Video Recording, Compatible with iPhone Android Phone, Camera
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: 【14.95-inch Flexible Gooseneck】 More flexible than other tripods, this phone tripod is equipped with an additional 14.95-inch flexible gooseneck that effortlessly bends in any direction, ensuring you can easily achieve long-distance or extremely low-angle shots. Suitable for various scenarios, including photography, live streaming, family photos, travel snapshots, and video recording.

【Multi-angle Shooting】Effortlessly transition between landscape, portrait, tilt-down, and tilt-up orientations. Revel in the convenience of adjusting your phone to the most comfortable viewing angle. Embrace unparalleled flexibility!

【Broad Compatibility】Our device, equipped with a universal 1/4" screw mount, is suitable for various devices, including iPhones (15, 14, 13, 12 Series), Android phones, digital cameras, action cameras, webcams, and camcorders.

【Enhanced Accessories】Our package includes an upgraded phone clamp for phones up to 5.7 inches wide, a cold shoe mount for microphone and LED light, a wireless Bluetooth remote control (up to 30 feet), and a convenient BC adapter for GoPro compatibility. All neatly packed in a portable travel bag.
【Complete Satisfaction Guaranteed】We provide a 12-month free warranty, ensuring complete satisfaction with your purchase. Contact us anytime with any questions or concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great quality phone tripod stand for selfies & video recording!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this for my home video making needs. Overall, I loved this phone tripod for its quality. Superior built and comes as a complete combo. Functions very well too and is highly recommended to anyone. Looks wise also it is nice with a graphite carbon matt finish.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Height extends from 18.8 to 67 inches & is very helpful to adjust as per your photography needs - The phone clamp can extend between 2.8" to 4.8" width-wise, so it should fit any small/medium/large phone device even when a case is on- Clamp has a strong grip & easy to operate overall- Tripod is very sturdy & stable overall on the floor while using - Has dedicated iOS & Android buttons in the Bluetooth remote. I have iPhone so the iOS button works - Rugged material and a nice finish that gives a great look overall- Well built product & feels durable- Comes already assembled and nothing to be done other than putting the phone mount- When folded, it is a small form factor product and hence great for portability reasons too- Very reasonably priced (Got for ~$17 including taxes & with the available coupon) for the quality & the feature Cons:- None that I see for this price & the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Stand, Extends Very High, Versatile!
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome phone tripod, especially for what you are getting for the price. Very small and portable when collapsed with a nice little carrying bag that is included, but extends further than most other tripods I've seen on the market, making it super versatile. The legs can be locked in different stages of opening and closing so that you can fit it in tight diameter spots. They are not individually height adjustable, but you can make up for a weird angle with the flexible neck mount that is included. The extending clamp for the phone stretches pretty far and holds securely without worry of it dropping my phone, and it's got a rubber grip that is padded so it feels like my phone is protected. The remote worked perfectly after pairing without any additional steps needed. Hit the button once for a photo or to start/stop video if you are in video mode, and if you hold the button down it will take short clips until you depress it. The angles for the phone are also adjustable if you are using the the top knob without the flexible extension as well, so you still have a lot of use out of this without having to install that piece if you don't want to. The adjustable height isn't notched or anything either, so you can get it to the exact height you are looking for as well. All in all, this thing is fantastic, absolutely love it, and highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Photography and Videography - Versatile and Rock-Solid!
reviews.reviewText: The Aureday 67" Phone Tripod & Camera Stand has truly revolutionized my photography and videography experience, earning every single one of its five stars. This tripod is a masterclass in versatility and sturdiness, making it an absolute essential for anyone looking to capture stunning shots and videos.The versatility of this tripod is a game-changer. Its adjustable height of 67" gives me the flexibility to shoot from various angles and perspectives, ensuring that I can capture every moment exactly as I envision it. Whether I'm shooting a breathtaking landscape or recording a dynamic video, this tripod adapts seamlessly to my needs.But what truly sets the Aureday Phone Tripod & Camera Stand apart is its exceptional sturdiness. The robust construction and high-quality materials instill confidence that my camera or phone is safe and secure, even in challenging conditions. Gone are the days of wobbly setups or shaky shots – this tripod stands rock-solid, ensuring professional-quality results.Setting up and adjusting the tripod is a breeze. The user-friendly design and intuitive controls make it easy for me to achieve the perfect framing and composition. The quick-release plate is a fantastic feature that lets me switch between devices with minimal hassle, saving me precious time on shoots.Whether I'm using my smartphone or a DSLR camera, this tripod supports both with equal grace. The included phone mount is adaptable to various sizes, holding my phone securely for flawless shots and steady videos. The compatibility with cameras is equally impressive, making this tripod a true all-in-one solution.In a world where capturing the perfect shot or video is paramount, the Aureday 67" Phone Tripod & Camera Stand is a true game-changer. Its versatility, sturdiness, and user-friendly design make it an indispensable tool for photographers and videographers of all levels. From hobbyists to professionals, this tripod elevates your work and ensures that every shot is a masterpiece. I wholeheartedly recommend it and give it an enthusiastic five stars. Don't miss out on the opportunity to take your photography and videography to the next level with this exceptional tripod!

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid and Reliable Phone Tripod with Impressive Height
reviews.reviewText: This phone tripod surpassed my expectations. Its a sturdy build, a reliable lock mechanism, and an impressive height for capturing great shots. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a reliable and versatile tripod for their smartphone.
I like the possibilities which gives this tripod.

Pleased with my purchase, the stand quality is actually pretty good, I was impressed. I am yet to use the Bluetooth feature. The phone holder is easy to use and mount phone. Delivery was quick and arrived as described.
